solution_line_template: The trucks and regular cars make up {trucks_and_regular_cars_percent}% of her collection because {regular_cars_percent}+{trucks_percent} equals <<{regular_cars_percent}+{trucks_percent}={trucks_and_regular_cars_percent}>>{trucks_and_regular_cars_percent}
This means convertibles make up {convertibles_percent}% of her collection because {total_percent}-{trucks_and_regular_cars_percent} equals {convertibles_percent}.
She has {num_convertibles} convertibles because {total_cars} times {convertibles_percent_decimal} equals <<{total_cars}*{convertibles_percent_decimal}={num_convertibles}>>{num_convertibles}
